citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocol # A170316 contains a list of various teaching procedures that may be performed on the animals. Several
of these procedures are only described generally in the protocol, and do not contain a complete description of the
work that may be performed.
All protocols must contain a complete description of the proposed use of the animals.
Correct by March 10, 2017
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Clinical Veterinarian

narrative:
2.31(e)(3)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
Protocol # A170316 contains a list of various teaching procedures that may be performed on the animals.  Several
of these procedures are only described generally in the protocol, and do not contain a complete description of the
work that may be performed.
All protocols must contain a complete description of the proposed use of the animals.
Correct by March 10, 2017
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Clinical Veterinarian
